contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Otoya Kawano'''|かわの をとや|Kawano Otoya|born August 18, 1965}} is a Japanese [[Seiyū|voice actor]] who was born in [[Taketa, Ōita]]. ==Notable voice roles== *[[Seishiro Sakurazuka]] in [[X (anime)|X/1999 the series]] *Gain Bijo in [[Overman King Gainer]] *Bougan man in [[Samurai 7]] *Ikazuchi no Takamaru in [[Onmyou Taisenki]] *Ryūjirō Sasaki in [[Samurai Champloo]] ==External links== * {{ann|people|5632}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kawano, Otoya | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese voice actor | DATE OF BIRTH = August 18, 1965 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kawano, Otoya}} [[Category:1965 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Japanese voice actors]] [[Category:People from Ōita Prefecture]] {{japan-voice-actor-stub}}
